Reviews.Title: Another Solid Product from Asus
Reviews.Author: ABM
Reviews.Content: Good build quality, large screen, and nice simple design. In my experience Asus products have been both solid and reliable and this should be no difference.  I have purchased about 10 or 15 of these over the last few months and have not had any issues at all.

Reviews.Title: Light Weight--Sleek
Reviews.Author: Marilyn J. Hofer
Reviews.Content: Light weighted and sleek - great for home use or travel.  I wanted a keyboard easy to type on--this one fits the requirement.  Fast too.

ProductInfo.Name: X75A-XH51 17.3" LED Notebook - Intel Core i5 2.50 GHz - Black
